title: Tip against your mates for OPL bragging rights
body:
#Start tipping this week for an instant 4 Win IP Boost!
http://i.imgur.com/cOYrYbt.png
[opltips.com.au](http://opltips.com.au)

Who knows the ins and outs of the OPL best in your circle of friends? Create or join a comp and show your mates who’s boss! What’s more? If you *sign up before Friday 3rd February you’ll get a 4 Win IP Boost!*

**Why should I tip?**
1. It’s an Oceanic tradition
2. It’s fun
3. If you win, you get bragging rights
4. BRAGGING RIGHTS

This year, you can create your own competition to tip against your mates, as well as track your total progress and unlock achievements. Not in an OPL circle? You’ll still be able to track your progress against all other registered tippers.

**EYES ON THE PRIZE(S)**
The top 50 placed tippers will get a slice of over 100,000 RP. In addition, each week EVERYONE who scores a perfect round (4/4 tips regardless of margins) will receive a 4 Win IP Boost.

Since we missed the first week, EVERYONE GETS A PERFECT ROUND! Which, if you do the math, means EVERYONE GETS A FREE 4 WIN IP BOOST!
This only applies to those who sign up before Friday 3rd February, so make sure you sign up with the correct summoner name, otherwise you might miss your prize!

Want more? Head to [OPLtips.com.au](http://OPLtips.com.au) to create your own comp within your group of friends, or join an OPL team’s competition! You’ll be in the OPL Official contest by default, but you can easily create or join a competition of your own choosing. Head [here to check out the master rules list.](http://oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/page/contest-master-rules)

**SPLIT 1 PRIZES (24 JAN TO 3RD APRIL)**
1st Place - 10,000 RP
2nd -10th - 5,000 RP
11th - 50th - 1,250 RP

replies.body:
Hey, 
Maybe im being really blind but I cant seem to find at all where I can see my actual score for the tipping? 
I can find what I tipped etc but not a running total or leaderboard?
Thanks

That is an extremely good point! Lol can't believe we did not spot that earlier. Even where you can find a rank (in Leaderboards) there's no clear point where it shows your score etc!

Will get right onto that, thanks TheGruffalo!
Is there a way to invite people to join our tournaments without emails? Can we get a way to make invite links or something please?

This website is something we are very much looking to improve - so please feel free to drop some constructive feedback for us if you have any :)

If you have any problems with it - email contact@opltips.com.au

Hey, just wondering why you guys are marketing this as if this is something from Riot? I thought this would be something similar to the Fantasy LCS, but this is from some third party company -- "Genius Sports Group Pty Ltd " (which also own some other tipping sites), how are you guys associated?

Honestly, I feel quite misled. This should have been disclosed in the announcement, but no where in this post or on the lolesports announcement is this mentioned. They've also plastered the OPL logo all over their site (not to mention the header looks very similar to the one on lolesports and behaves extremely similarly), which makes it feel like the site's owned by Riot. The only clue is that you've said our existing League accounts wouldn't work, which would be strange if this was built in house from Riot.

I had to read their privacy policy and terms & conditions {{summoner:3}} (which don't have any mention of Riot Games and are simply copy pasted from their other tipping sites) to find out. A little disappointing, you guys are usually really good about these sorts of things.

Also because this is marketed from Riot, many players are assuming they should be able to log in with their League account because it isn't mentioned in the main post but hidden in a comment below. If this company has a rogue developer, this makes it very easy for this them to phish players who try to log in with their League credentials. This is already a problem as can be seen on the main announcement where there are numerous comments about not being able to log in with their account.

Hey Reduxed - thanks for taking the time to pass this on - you raise lots of very good points that we will take into consideration for future projects. To try and put you at ease though - this is a company we have commissioned and worked with to build the platform and tailor it to the OPL. This is the first iteration of a platform / product that we are definitely interested in incorporating into the oce.lolesports.com website. We aim to be fairly agile with product releases like this though so that we can take community feedback on board and make improvements and re-release, and incorporating it into our website will take much longer - but is definitely on the list. Last year we ran the tipping contest on a google sheet - so this is visually and functionally a huge improvement.

I hope you take the fact that we are endorsing this product as enough to trust that we have done our due diligence on the company and the product here and that you are willing to join the competition anyway. We will definitely aim to make sure it is far more telegraphed when the product is not produced internally by Riot in the future - we did not mean to mislead you at all.

Once again I do really appreciate you taking the time to explain what you have though - it's a perspective I'm sure other players share with you and something that we need to be aware of and understand when releasing products with partners.

Cheers!
